document_data.name: Alshinree
document_data.mainbody: '''Alshinree''' was a dancer in the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: By the year {{yearlinkName|767}}, Alshinree was getting a bit gaunt due to old age.
document_data.Abilities: In her youth, she had been quite an enticing dancer. About once a month, she went into a trance during dances, which allowed her to cast a strange [[spell]] that gave directions to caches of unfound magic.
document_data.Activities: She danced at a club known as [[the Stars and Sword]].
